Identification_Area.title: BepiColombo MPO MIXS-C Calibrated Housekeeping Report

Modification_Detail.description: This is the first version of this product

Table_Character.name: MIXS-C Calibrated Housekeeping Report Table
Table_Character.description: This table is a Character table containing the archived MIXS calibrated fpaC housekeeping parameters

Field_Character.name: TIME_UTC
Field_Character.description: UTC timestamp of packet

Field_Character.name: TIME_OBT
Field_Character.description: S/C clock at packet time

Field_Character.name: FPA_POWER_STATUS
Field_Character.description: Valid states are OFF, ON

Field_Character.name: MIXS_C_MODE
Field_Character.description: Valid states are OFF, SAFE, STANDBY, SCIENCE, ANNEALING

Field_Character.name: RAM_ADDRESS_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 0. Address for read/write in offset table, sequencer program and image buffer. Auto-incremented when one of these registers (1,3 and 4) is read or written to (note they are not telemetered in this report).

Field_Character.name: SEQUENCER_XY_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 2. Address currently being read by the sequencer

Field_Character.name: OFFSET_XY_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 5. Offset table address currently being read by the sequencer

Field_Character.name: DAC_DIVISOR_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 6 bits 3-0 Divisor used to calculate DAC clocks. Valid values are in the range 8-23

Field_Character.name: BIAS_DIVISOR_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 6 bits 9-8 Divisor used to calculate VbiasClock and Vdrift3Clock frequencies. Valid values are 2, 4, 8

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_REGISTER_RUN
Field_Character.description: FPA register 9 bit 0 Sequencer enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_REGISTER_SET_RUN
Field_Character.description: FPA register 9 bit 1 Action of run bit (previous parameter) enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_REGISTER_EN_CAPTURE
Field_Character.description: FPA register 9 bit 3 Capture of raw images enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_REGISTER_EN_OUTPUT
Field_Character.description: FPA register 9 bit 4 Detector data output enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: CONTROL_REGISTER_SET_OUTPUT
Field_Character.description: FPA register 9 bit 5 Action of enOutput bit (previous parameter) enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: THRESHOLD_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 10 Threshold for event detection -calibration is not meaningful unless applied pixel by pixel. This will be calibrated in future steps

Field_Character.name: BLACK_LEVEL_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 11 Rate at which black level events are produced - one pixel every n frames

Field_Character.name: COMMAND_COUNT_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 13 Number of commands received; never reset (but wraps around at 255)

Field_Character.name: TIMING_SIGNATURE_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 14 Sequencer check. This is the output of a checking algorithm defined in REF and should always have the value of 0xNNNN

Field_Character.name: V_BIAS_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 16 Detector bias voltage

Field_Character.name: V_DRIFT_3_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 17 Voltage on the outer drift ring

Field_Character.name: V_DRIFT_1_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 19 Voltage on the inner drift ring

Field_Character.name: V_INNER_SUBSTRATE_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 20 Voltage on the inner substrate

Field_Character.name: V_BIAS_ENABLE_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 15 bit 0 VbiasClock enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: V_DRIFT_ENABLE_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 15 bit 1 Vdrift3Clock enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: SWITCHER_BOOST_ENABLE_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 15 bit 2 Current boost in switchers enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_N
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 8 heartbeatN signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_S
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 9 heartbeatS signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_CDS_MUX_OUT_N
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 10 CDSmuxOutN signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_CDS_MUX_OUT_S
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 11 CDSmuxOutS signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_NE
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 12 heartbeatNE signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_NW
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 13 heartbeatNW signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_SE
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 14 heartbeatSE signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: EN_SIGNATURE_REGISTER_HEARTBEAT_SW
Field_Character.description: FPA register 21 bit 15 heartbeatSW signal monitoring enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: V_DRAIN_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 24 Detector DEPFET drain voltage

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_HIGH_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 25 Clear switch high voltage

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_LOW_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 26 Clear switch low voltage

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_GATE_HIGH_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 27 Clear gate switch high voltage

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_GATE_LOW_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 28 Clear gate switch low voltage

Field_Character.name: V_GATE_HIGH_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 29 Gate switch high voltage

Field_Character.name: V_GATE_LOW_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 30 Gate switch low voltage

Field_Character.name: V_SOURCE_N_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 31 DEPFET current set for the N sector

Field_Character.name: V_SOURCE_S_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 32 DEPFET current set for the S sector

Field_Character.name: V_BIAS_N_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 33 DEPFET current set for the N sector in conjunction with I_SOURCE_N

Field_Character.name: V_BIAS_S_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 34 DEPFET current set for the S sector in conjunction with I_SOURCE_S

Field_Character.name: OFFSET_N_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 35 Global offset for the N sector

Field_Character.name: OFFSET_S_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 36 Global offset for the S sector

Field_Character.name: V_TEST_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 39 Test voltage for the Asteroid Valid values are 0-7

Field_Character.name: TEST_FREQUENCY_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 38 Frequency for the Asteroid test signal Valid values are 0-16

Field_Character.name: V_S_1_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 0

Field_Character.name: V_S_2_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 1

Field_Character.name: V_S_3_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 2

Field_Character.name: V_CC_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 3

Field_Character.name: V_DD_1_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 4

Field_Character.name: V_DD_2_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 5

Field_Character.name: V_DD_A_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 6

Field_Character.name: V_SS_A_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 7

Field_Character.name: V_EE_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 8

Field_Character.name: V_BIAS_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 9

Field_Character.name: V_DRIFT_3_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 10

Field_Character.name: V_DRIFT_1_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 11

Field_Character.name: V_DRAIN_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 12

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_HIGH_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 13

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_LOW_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 14

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_GATE_HIGH_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 15

Field_Character.name: V_CLEAR_GATE_LOW_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 16

Field_Character.name: V_GATE_HIGH_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 17

Field_Character.name: V_GATE_LOW_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 18

Field_Character.name: I_SOURCE_N_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 19

Field_Character.name: I_SOURCE_S_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 20

Field_Character.name: TEMPERATURE_N_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 21

Field_Character.name: TEMPERATURE_S_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 22

Field_Character.name: TEMPERATURE_I_ANALOGUE
Field_Character.description: Analogue 23

Field_Character.name: OVER_RANGE_ENABLE
Field_Character.description: Over-range filtering enabled/disabled

Field_Character.name: CONFIG_ERROR_COUNT
Field_Character.description: Number of FPA configuration error events. Never reset but wraps around at 255

Field_Character.name: TIMING_ERROR_COUNT
Field_Character.description: Number of FPA timing error events. Never reset but wraps around at 255.

Field_Character.name: RESPONSE_TIMEOUT_COUNT
Field_Character.description: Number of FPA response timeout events. Never reset but wraps around at 255.

Field_Character.name: SPLIT_PIXEL_COUNT_RATE
Field_Character.description: FPA register 42 Threshold for split pixel identification - calibration is not meaningful unless applied pixel by pixel. This will be calibrated in future steps

Field_Character.name: SPLIT_PIXEL_IDENTIFICATION_THRESHOLD
Field_Character.description: FPA register 42 Threshold for split pixel identification - calibration is not meaningful unless applied pixel by pixel. This will be calibrated in future steps

Field_Character.name: SPLIT_PIXEL_PROCESSING_MODE
Field_Character.description: FPA register 41 bits 1-0 Split pixel mode. 4 modes numbered Mode 0 to Mode 3 - see [EAICD?] for descriptions of these modes

Field_Character.name: PIXEL_ZERO_CONTROL
Field_Character.description: FPA register 41 bit 2 Specifies which neighbouring pixels are zeroed when a split pixel is identified. See [EAICD?] for details

Field_Character.name: CHARGED_PARTICLE_PROCESSING_CONTROL
Field_Character.description: FPA register 41 bit 3 Charged particle processing control

Field_Character.name: BLACK_LEVEL_PIXEL_COMPARISON
Field_Character.description: FPA register 41 bit 4 Threshold against which black level pixels are compared. Valid values are THRESHOLD and SPIT

Field_Character.name: FIFO_OVERFLOW_REGISTER
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 0 Whether output FIFO buffer has overflowed since last reset. Valid values are OVERFLOW and NO_OVERFLOW

Field_Character.name: FIFO_PARITY_ERROR
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 1 Whether output FIFO has had a parity error since last reset. Valid values are ERROR and NO_ERROR

Field_Character.name: OFFSET_TABLE_PARITY_ERROR
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 2 Whether parity error is detected in offset table memory. Valid values are ERROR and NO_ERROR

Field_Character.name: IMAGE_BUFFER_PARITY_ERROR
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 3 Whether parity error is detected in image buffer memory. Valid values are ERROR and NO_ERROR

Field_Character.name: NORTH_DATA_PROCESSING_PARITY_ERROR
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 4 Whether parity error is detected in North data processing chain. Valid values are ERROR and NO_ERROR

Field_Character.name: SOUTH_DATA_PROCESSING_PARITY_ERROR
Field_Character.description: FPA register 37 bit 5 Whether parity error is detected in South data processing chain. Valid values are ERROR and NO_ERROR

Field_Character.name: SCIENCE_TM_PACKING_OPTION_THRESHOLD
Field_Character.description: Defines method by which pixel events are packed into records. Valid values are 0,1,2, and 3. Each value refers to a different packing method described in [EAICD?]
